function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges of ensuring social distancing in densely populated urban slums and refugee habitations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within tightly packed living spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of community-level interventions and infrastructural changes to enable social distancing","Technologies":"Community engagement and education programs, urban planning and infrastructure development","People":"Residents of densely populated urban slums and refugee habitations","Owner":"Local government, community leaders, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of separate space for isolation or quarantine of contacts or suspected cases","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread within households and communities","Mitigation":"Establishment of dedicated isolation facilities and quarantine centers, and provision of resources for home-based isolation","Technologies":"Construction of temporary isolation centers, use of mobile health units, and deployment of digital monitoring tools","People":"Contacts and suspected cases of contagious diseases, households","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of freedom of movement facilitating transmission of virus","Impact":"Increased movement of infected individuals leading to wider spread of disease","Mitigation":"Enforcement of travel restrictions, implementation of strict quarantine protocols, and promotion of responsible travel behavior","Technologies":"GPS tracking, digital monitoring, and mobile communication technologies","People":"General population, travelers, individuals in affected areas","Owner":"Government authorities, transportation agencies, public health agencies"}]}
